languages.text: "Фиксирую покушение мыслью и делом на священные горны. Запускаю процедуру благостного истребления". {n}Голос Паскаля кровожадно рычит, словно цепной меч. Лязгнув клешнями мехадендрита, он устремляется в атаку.{/n}

"Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Фиксирую покушение мыслью и делом на священные горны. Запускаю процедуру благостного истребления". {n}Голос Паскаля кровожадно рычит, словно цепной меч. Лязгнув клешнями мехадендрита, он устремляется в атаку.{/n}

One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

"Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

"Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

"Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

languages.text: 「神聖な炉への侵害を、思考と行動の両面から認知した。徳による抹消手続きを開始する」{n}パスカルの声は血に飢えたような唸り声で、その音はチェーンソードの唸りと似ていた。彼の機械触手のひとつがパチンパチンと音を立てて、彼は戦闘に突入した。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「神聖な炉への侵害を、思考と行動の両面から認知した。徳による抹消手続きを開始する」{n}パスカルの声は血に飢えたような唸り声で、その音はチェーンソードの唸りと似ていた。彼の機械触手のひとつがパチンパチンと音を立てて、彼は戦闘に突入した。{/n}

languages.text: « Enregistrement d'une violation des fourneaux sacrés par la pensée et l'action. Lancement d'une procédure d'éradication vertueuse. » {n}Le vox de Pasqal n'est plus qu'un grognement sauvage, qui rappelle le son d'une épée tronçonneuse. Il fait claquer la pince d'une de ses mécadendrites en se jetant dans la mêlée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Enregistrement d'une violation des fourneaux sacrés par la pensée et l'action. Lancement d'une procédure d'éradication vertueuse. » {n}Le vox de Pasqal n'est plus qu'un grognement sauvage, qui rappelle le son d'une épée tronçonneuse. Il fait claquer la pince d'une de ses mécadendrites en se jetant dans la mêlée.{/n}

languages.text: “探测到对神圣熔炉的侵犯思想与行为，准备初始化良性清除程序。”{n}帕斯卡的声音仿佛嗜血的咆哮一般，让人想起了链锯剑的呼啸声。他冲向了战场，其中一条机械触须张开了钳子。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “探测到对神圣熔炉的侵犯思想与行为，准备初始化良性清除程序。”{n}帕斯卡的声音仿佛嗜血的咆哮一般，让人想起了链锯剑的呼啸声。他冲向了战场，其中一条机械触须张开了钳子。{/n}

languages.text: «Registrando la invasión de los hornos sagrados por medio de pensamiento y acción. Iniciando procedimiento de erradicación sin fisuras». {n}La voz de Pasqal adquiere la forma de gruñido sanguinario, cuyo sonido recuerda al chirrido de una espada sierra. Una de sus mecadendritas chasquea las tenazas mientras carga hacia la refriega.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Registrando la invasión de los hornos sagrados por medio de pensamiento y acción. Iniciando procedimiento de erradicación sin fisuras». {n}La voz de Pasqal adquiere la forma de gruñido sanguinario, cuyo sonido recuerda al chirrido de una espada sierra. Una de sus mecadendritas chasquea las tenazas mientras carga hacia la refriega.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich registriere eine Verletzung der heiligen Öfen durch Gedanken und Taten. Leite tugendhafte Auslöschungsprozedur ein." {n}Pasqals Stimme ist ein blutrünstiges Knurren, das an das Jaulen eines Kettenschwerts erinnert. Einer seiner Mechadendriten lässt seine Zangen klappern, als er sich ins Getümmel stürzt.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich registriere eine Verletzung der heiligen Öfen durch Gedanken und Taten. Leite tugendhafte Auslöschungsprozedur ein." {n}Pasqals Stimme ist ein blutrünstiges Knurren, das an das Jaulen eines Kettenschwerts erinnert. Einer seiner Mechadendriten lässt seine Zangen klappern, als er sich ins Getümmel stürzt.{/n}

languages.text: "Hem düşünce hem de eylem yoluyla kutsal ocaklara tecavüz edildiği kayda geçildi. Faziletli imha prosedürü başlatılıyor." {n}Pasqal, kana susamış bir hırıltıyla konuşuyor. Sesi, motorlu kılıcın uğultusunu andırıyor. Mekadentritlerinden biri, kavgaya atılırmışçasına kıskaçlarını şaklatıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Registering encroachment upon sacred furnaces through both thought and action. Initiating virtuous eradication procedure." {n}Pasqal's voice is a bloodthirsty growl, its sound reminiscent of the whirring of a chainsword. One of his mechadendrites snaps its pincers as he charges into the fray.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hem düşünce hem de eylem yoluyla kutsal fırınlara tecavüz kaydedildi. Faziletli imha prosedürü başlatılıyor." {n}Pasqal, kana susamış bir hırıltıyla konuşuyor. Sesi, motorlu kılıcın uğultusunu andırıyor. Mekadentritlerinden biri, kavgaya atılırken kıskaçlarını şaklatıyor.{/n}
